com.jme3.scene.plugins.gltf

Class MaterialAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.plugins.gltf.MaterialAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PBRMaterialAdapter

    public abstract class MaterialAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    A MaterialAdapter allows to map a GLTF material to a JME material. It maps each gltf parameter to it's matching parameter in the JME material, and allows for some conversion if the JME material model doesn't exactly match the gltf material model Created by Nehon on 08/08/2017.
